turns.model_output: I would share stories of individuals or groups who have made a positive impact on the world. These stories can serve as inspiration and demonstrate the profound effect that dedication and compassion can have on society. By highlighting these examples, I hope to encourage others to find their own ways to contribute positively to the world.
